title: RITES Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 11 Section Engineer, Drawing and Design Engineer and Other Posts
description: The Rites Limited has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 11 Section Engineers, Planning & Procurement Engineers, Drawing & Design Engineers, and Assistant Environmental Experts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Electrical, Electronics, and Civil Engineering can apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025 . The interested app...
